@graph.description: +1 Hedonism XP for each time successfully distracting or provoking someone and -1 if failing.

@graph.name: Central Intelligence
@graph.description: All characters connected by a telepathic link can choose to use the caster's cunning value instead of their own.

@graph.name: Change Voice
@graph.description: Copies the voice of another person that you have heard before.

@graph.name: Chaotic Thorn
@graph.description: As a reaction after seeing an enemy casting a spell, fires a chaotic thorn that increases the difficulty of casting the spell by +3.

@graph.name: Charge
@graph.description: Does not need to stop running to perform a melee attack and can attack any character in range during any step in movement trajectory. Can only attack one target per running block and must spend AP accordingly.

@graph.name: Charm
@graph.description: A spiritual attack that leaves the target enchanted if they fail or graze on a will test against the Enchantment.

@graph.name: Cleric
@graph.description: The character becomes a cleric of a deity. It is only possible to become a cleric if the character is not devoted to another and shares a common conviction with the deity. This allows all abilities from the deity's list to be learned with Devotion XP. The Devotion level + SPI is used as a skill to perform these spells.

@graph.name: Climber I/II/III
@graph.description: +2/4/6 bonus for climbing. I. Learns to spend 1 STA on a critical to double climbing speed. II. Increases crawling and climbing speed to 0.5m xMM per AP. III. The character is not considered prone while climbing.

@graph.name: Clinch
@graph.description: You can initiate a grapple without cost whenever you redirect an attack in melee range and the attack misses. The character must have the grapple property on any of their equipped weapons. Hands only count if they are free.

@graph.name: Clone
@graph.description: Converts the genes of a part of the body of a preserved corpse to match those of another creature of the same species. A living sample of the model must be present. Converts 10kg of biological matter per TE.

@graph.name: Collective Hysteria
@graph.description: Each character that is afraid or angry increases the DL of fear or anger spells by 1.

@graph.name: Combat Acrobatics
@graph.description: The evasive jump grants +4 extra dodge instead of +3.

@graph.name: Combat Instincts I/II/III
@graph.description: Increases armor coverage by 1/2/3 if not immobilized.

@graph.name: Combo
@graph.description: Increases the amount of AP granted by the fighting surge by 1/2 AP.

@graph.name: Command
@graph.description: Gives a simple command to a confused target and leaves them Dominated if they graze or fail on a will test. They remain Dominated until they complete the task, become unconscious, or succeed on a will test to break free from the domination. It is not possible to change the task without using Command again, but it is possible to specify it.

@graph.name: Complete Possession
@graph.description: Can permanently possess a body. The XP cost of the ability is for possessing a body, where x represents the difficulty of possessing the body.

@graph.name: Control Theory I/II
@graph.description: Overloading spells only increases difficulty by 4/3.

@graph.name: Control Tree
@graph.description: Controls a tree that has a movement mechanism to attack something or move.

@graph.name: Counterattack
@graph.description: You can attack in response to an attack, as long as you are within range. Both attacks are made against the opponent's SD. The attack with the higher result hits first, having the chance to interrupt the opponent. The counterattack receives -2 to hit.

@graph.name: Create Fog
@graph.description: Condenses water in the air over a large area, creating a thick fog that hinders visibility. Cannot be cast in low humidity areas.

@graph.name: Crossbow and Shield
@graph.description: Allows the character to be in guard with a tower shield while shooting and reloading a crossbow or arbalest.

@graph.name: Danger Intuition
@graph.description: The character is immune to starting combat surprised.

@graph.name: Darken
@graph.description: Absorbs all light entering an area, making it difficult for those outside to see what is inside. Makes anyone inside invisible to those outside, who only see a large black circle.

@graph.name: Dazzling Flash
@graph.description: Produces a powerful flash that blinds anyone in the area. Victims must make a reflex test, at no AP cost. On a failure or graze, they are dazzled for 1 round. The flash is blocked by fog, dust clouds, and magical darkening.

@graph.name: Death Spin
@graph.description: Sweeping attacks with two-handed weapons can cover up to 360 degrees.

@graph.name: Defender
@graph.description: Allows you to spend 1 STA to move 1 normal movement as a reaction to position yourself to defend someone.

@graph.name: Defibrillate
@graph.description: Wakes an unconscious target.

@graph.name: Defoliate
@graph.description: Causes all deciduous trees in the area to lose their leaves within 1 turn. The leaves are flammable.

@graph.name: Desperate Action I/II/III
@graph.description: Can perform a block, evasion, or reflex even without sufficient AP, but must spend 1 STA + the normal cost of the action to do so. Cannot end up with less than -2/-3/-4 AP.

@graph.name: Detonate Explosive
@graph.description: Detonates an explosive that is already loaded, causing it to deal its damage and effects.

@graph.name: Disintegrate Mind
@graph.description: Destroys a creature's mind permanently. Reduces SPI to 0 permanently and resets all convictions to 0. This can be done by clerics of Iskar even without having learned this ability, but the target's consent is required.

@graph.name: Divine Guide
@graph.description: Can cast a careful spell with only 1 additional AP for spells associated with the deity.

@graph.name: Divine Intervention
@graph.description: Once per day, the character has a 50\

@graph.name: Divine Overload
@graph.description: Overloading a spell from the deity's list increases the stamina cost by 50\

@graph.name: Echolocation
@graph.description: Allows the character to see with their ears. Vision counts as dazzled, but it is omnidirectional.

@graph.name: Efficiency Optimization I
@graph.description: Careful casting reduces the stamina cost of spells by 1.

@graph.name: Electric Skin
@graph.description: Turns Taser into a favorite spell. Taser can be accelerated to cost 0 AP and can be used with the hands, allowing the electric object to be stored.

@graph.name: Electricity Implant
@graph.description: Allows the use of electricity abilities.

@graph.name: Electrochemical Sharpening
@graph.description: Performs a sharpening action on a weapon. Improving gives a critical hit on the sharpening.

@graph.name: Elf
@graph.description: Gains the ability to meditate for 4 hours a day to gain +3 Devotion for the day. The bonus also applies if in a sacred place. The character must meditate every day; otherwise, they will become ill within 24 hours. The entity worshiped by the cleric has +10 on the DL of compulsions against the elf's will.

@graph.name: Elite Sniper
@graph.description: Precise shots cost 1 AP less.

@graph.name: Energy Saturation I/II/III
@graph.description: Learns to saturate the body with energy, increasing the learned CON by +1/2/3.

@graph.name: Enhanced Sleep
@graph.description: Blesses the sleep of everyone in the area for 4 hours, allowing everyone except the caster to receive +3 health for resting and to complete it in 4h.

@graph.name: Explosive
@graph.description: Receives -3 on any test to resist becoming angry or to calm down when already furious.

@graph.name: Extinguish Flames
@graph.description: Extinguishes the flames of any combustible material it can touch.

@graph.name: Extract Water
@graph.description: Extracts moisture from the air and directs it to a location, which can be a container. The amount of water extracted is equivalent to 0.5L.

@graph.name: Face Sculpting
@graph.description: Makes a sorcery test of DC 16 to change the appearance of your face. Looks exactly as the caster desires on a critical success and gains the Beautiful or Ugly trait, if desired. Has only minor imperfections on a success. On a graze, has a 50\

@graph.name: Favorite Spell
@graph.description: Choose a spell to reduce its difficulty by 2. The required talent is the same as that used to learn the spell. The spell can be performed safely.

@graph.name: Fear of Heights
@graph.description: Receives -5 for moral tests when in high places, with a risk of falling.

@graph.name: Fire Breath
@graph.description: Allows the user to blow hot air from their mouth as if it were a long weapon. The attack deals burn damage equal to the base damage of the implant xDM. This attack is considered precise and a small weapon.

@graph.name: Fire Storm
@graph.description: Ignites any combustible object in the area. It does not deal damage initially, but blinds and suffocates anyone inside and deals 5 burn damage with PEN 4 to anyone who starts their turn within it.

@graph.name: First Aid
@graph.description: Learn to heal wounds, make splints, and fix broken bones. By spending an exploration turn, you can provide 2 heals to an injured creature if used within 4 hours after it has been hurt. This action stabilizes a deadly wound.

@graph.name: Flamethrower
@graph.description: Creates flames from an igneous stone, dealing its base damage xDM in burn damage to all within a cone in front of the caster. The flamethrower can be sustained, dealing explosion damage to anyone entering the area. The damage is applied only once, based on the position that causes the most damage.

@graph.name: Four Legs
@graph.description: Gains quadrupedal movement, gaining +3 on any balance test and its running speed is AGI/2. Cannot have anything in its hands while walking on four legs.

@graph.name: Freeze Water
@graph.description: Freezes water in an area after one turn. A puddle becomes slippery, turning into difficult terrain with a DC of 12. A layer of ice 10 cm thick is created on a water surface, but additional layers can be added if there is enough water. The temperature of the ice increases due to its freezing, causing it to start melting immediately.

@graph.name: Frighten
@graph.description: A spiritual attack that causes someone to become afraid if they fail or graze on a will test against the Stress.

@graph.name: Fur / Scales
@graph.description: Choose Fur or Scales. Fur: Becomes Furry, granting +3 on tests to resist exposure to cold and increases natural INS by 2xDM. Scales: Makes the skin resemble that of a crocodile. Increases natural TGH by +2xDM.

@graph.name: Galvanic Corrosion
@graph.description: Rusts an object that is susceptible to rust. Leaves armors pockmarked and weapons smaller than size 5 without wire. It is necessary to hit an attack against an object for the effect to occur.

@graph.name: Gentle Art
@graph.description: You can take a -2 penalty on grapple tests in exchange for reducing the STA cost by 1.

@graph.name: Geographer I/II
@graph.description: I. Allows the use of geography knowledge + detection as an exploration skill, provided you have a map. II. Allows for professional map-making.

@graph.name: Ghost
@graph.description: Can generate a ghost that behaves like the spiritual walk but has limited energy. The ghost receives x STA and disappears if STA reaches 0. All memories of the ghost are lost if it does not return to the original body. The ghost loses 2 STA per turn or 1 STA if the spell is perfected.

@graph.name: Gills
@graph.description: Can rest with half the STA regeneration underwater and does not lose STA due to suffocation.

@graph.name: Glutton
@graph.description: The character can eat 2x the normal amount per day.

@graph.name: Grapple in Battle I/II/III
@graph.description: Reduces the penalties for being grappled from 3 to 2/1/0.

@graph.name: Grappling Combat
@graph.description: Grants attacks for grappling that cost 4AP+1STA and inflict wounds directly. Critical hits can cause special effects: Suffocate the enemy, break an arm, and break a leg. Hits immobilize the opponent.

@graph.name: Grenadier
@graph.description: Learns to cast spells into grenades while throwing them, using the higher cost of AP between the throw and the spell.

@graph.name: Guerrilla Tactics
@graph.description: When making ranged attacks stealthily, reduces the penalties for stealth to 3. If the character is downed, they do not receive the penalty for shooting.

@graph.name: Gymnast I/II/III
@graph.description: I. Balance tests can be performed safely. II. Falling damage is halved from the original damage when landing on feet. III. Falling damage is reduced to one third if landing on feet.

@graph.name: Healing Avatar
@graph.description: Sends a generous amount of healing energy to a target, performing 8 AP in healing spells per turn with the target's STA, but without costing them AP.

@graph.name: Healing Food
@graph.description: Modifies a portion of food to provide 1 healing during the next 4-hour period.

@graph.name: Healing Leaves
@graph.description: Generates 5 healing energy leaves that fly around the area. Whenever someone in the area takes damage, a leaf merges with the wound, stopping POD/2 bleeding.

@graph.name: Healing Touch
@graph.description: The target has accelerated regenerative effects in health/3 healings. Enhancing increases it to health/2 and augmenting makes the effect affect a larger creature. Stops a character who is dying.

@graph.name: Hibernation
@graph.description: Can rest for long periods. The character only receives 1 hunger and 1 thirst every 2 days of sleep.

@graph.name: Hook
@graph.description: Increases the threat area of the reaction, allowing you to spend 1 STA to move 1 basic movement before using the hook attack as a reaction.

@graph.name: Hungry
@graph.description: Receives -3 mental if suffering any distress from hunger.

@graph.name: Ignite Implant
@graph.description: Allows the use of combustion abilities.

@graph.name: Incendiary Explosive
@graph.description: Transforms the explosive into a sticky substance that ignites when activated, upon contact with fire or on impact, dealing 30xDM burn damage.

@graph.name: Infrared Vision
@graph.description: Modifies the eyes to be able to see infrared light, allowing aiming at heat sources even through fog or in the dark.

@graph.name: Insomnia
@graph.description: Receives -2 to health when trying to rest, but gains +2 to cunning while unconscious.

@graph.name: Interference Matrix
@graph.description: Increases the difficulty of casting any spell within the area by 3.

@graph.name: Invisibility
@graph.description: Bends the rays of light around the caster during the duration to make them invisible.

@graph.name: Jump Shot
@graph.description: Spends 1 extra STA to jump backward and perform a quick shot or throw, avoiding opportunity attacks if the jump takes them out of range.

@graph.name: Jumper
@graph.description: I. Increases jump distance by 1/2m.

@graph.name: Kleptomania
@graph.description: May be compelled to steal something. Must make a will test with a difficulty of 5 to avoid being compelled. Loses 1 XP if not stealing and gains 1 Hedonism XP if attempting to steal.

@graph.name: Lamp
@graph.description: Creates a ball of light in a metallic object that you can touch. Otherwise, it makes the caster themselves glow, but costs double stamina and PV.

@graph.name: Lancer
@graph.description: Removes the penalty from braced attack while mounted.

@graph.name: Landslide
@graph.description: Heats and cools a solid, causing expansion and contraction in adjacent planes of the solid, causing it to break. This technique works well on crystalline structures, rocks, and especially wet soil. One turn later, it triggers a landslide or snow that damages anyone still in the area.

@graph.name: Large Hands
@graph.description: Allows the use of melee weapons from a larger size category with a -2 penalty to hit, an increased AP cost of +1, and with STR-3 in the contribution to weapon damage. The hands also count as a weapon of larger size.

@graph.name: Lasers
@graph.description: Converges the rays of light from a large light source into a single point at a distance, causing 30xDM radiant damage to the target per activation. The laser is considered a projectile but does not receive any distance penalty up to 50m.

@graph.name: Last Breath
@graph.description: The character can gain 3 AP, but spends 2 STA to do so and, as soon as their turn ends, loses 5 AP, potentially going negative.

@graph.name: Laws of Telekinesis
@graph.description: Extending the range of a spell only increases the casting difficulty by 2.

@graph.name: Leidenfrost Barrier
@graph.description: During rest, protects the face and respiratory system from environmental burn effects for one turn, preventing 5 damage and allowing breathing and keeping eyes open if no damage is received.

@graph.name: Lightning Reaction
@graph.description: Increases the amount of AP from the reaction burst by +1/+2.

@graph.name: Literacy
@graph.description: Learns to read and write.

@graph.name: Lumberjack I/II
@graph.description: Reduces the penalty for hitting heavy attacks by 1/2.

@graph.name: Lunge
@graph.description: Allows you to move one basic movement for 1 STA before using an attack as an action. This movement triggers opportunity attacks and braced attacks normally.

@graph.name: Mage I/II/III
@graph.description: Increases witchcraft by +1/2/3.

@graph.name: Magic Theory
@graph.description: Grants the wizard the ability to maintain a grimoire, which allows for precise spell instructions to be written. Enables learning spells from grimoires. Can attempt to cast any spell written in a grimoire in a risky manner if out of combat. The difficulty to cast the spell is increased by 3 for each point of knowledge below the requirement.

@graph.name: Magical Interpretation
@graph.description: Learns to identify spells cast by anyone within the area of synesthesia before they are cast, as long as they know the spell.

@graph.name: Magical Practices
@graph.description: Quickly casting spells increases the casting difficulty by 2, not 3. Additionally, it is possible to use a spell with a cost of action points less than or equal to 2, after being accelerated, as a reaction when an opponent attempts to enter melee range.

@graph.name: Magical Stability
@graph.description: Extending the duration of a spell only increases the casting difficulty by 2.

@graph.name: Magical Trance
@graph.description: The character becomes unable to perform any action other than sensing or witchcraft. In return, the character's maximum action points are equal to INT. This ability must be activated at the beginning of a turn and cannot be turned off until the beginning of the next.

@graph.name: Magnetic Shield
@graph.description: Attracts metallic objects to the most resistant point of the armor. The opponent must make a strength test against the DL of sorcery to detach a metallic object from the armor.

@graph.name: Master Rogue I/II
@graph.description: +1/2 to detection, stealth, and prestidigitation.

@graph.name: Master with Blades
@graph.description: Increases the PEN of melee weapons with PEN 2x or greater by 2/4/6.

@graph.name: Mechanic
@graph.description: I. Allows the character to attempt to pick locks and set or disarm traps.

@graph.name: Mental Palace
@graph.description: Helps someone remember something, gaining +2 on any knowledge test. Additionally, they can recall all the details of anything they can perceive during the duration of the spell.

@graph.name: Mental Paralysis
@graph.description: Completely paralyzes the mind of a confused creature that grazes or fails on their will test against stress, rendering them immobile and possibly fallen.

@graph.name: Metabolic Control
@graph.description: Learns to perform multiple rests per day.

@graph.name: Micro-combustion intracellulare
@graph.description: Gains +5 to resist cold damage while intoxicated.

@graph.name: Mind Reading
@graph.description: Allows reading the surface flow of thoughts in a telepathically connected mind, enabling the perception of images and hearing words they think and memories they recall. Gains +5 cunning against anyone under the telepathic link.

@graph.name: Miracle
@graph.description: Allows the casting of any spell contained within the deity's list, even without knowing it or having sufficient level, but incurs a -2 penalty on the spellcasting test for these and must perform them in a risky manner.

@graph.name: Mounted Shooter
@graph.description: I. Reduces the penalty for shooting while riding by 1/2.

@graph.name: Muscle Overcoming
@graph.description: Spend 2 STA to increase Strength in a strength test, climbing, or grabbing by STR/2 for a single action or reaction.

@graph.name: Mutagenic Agents
@graph.description: Allows learning metabolic mutation skills with sorcery, but only on oneself.

@graph.name: Natural Shelter
@graph.description: The character can build a shelter using natural objects in 4 hours. This shelter reduces the difficulty of exposure while sleeping by 5.

@graph.name: Nymphomaniac
@graph.description: Receives -3 to resist seduction tests. Gains 1 Hedonism XP each time they successfully seduce someone, but loses 1 XP whenever they fail.

@graph.name: Obese
@graph.description: Receives -1 load penalty. When Hunger reaches 45, the character loses this ability and their hunger resets to 15.

@graph.name: Obsessive
@graph.description: +1 to the talent of one proficiency, -1 to all others.

@graph.name: Odor Repertoire
@graph.description: Recognizes smells on a success if the scent is familiar. Increases food searching and tracking by +3 and allows tracking by smell.

@graph.name: Offend
@graph.description: A spiritual attack that causes someone to become enraged if they fail or graze on a will test against Stress.

@graph.name: Offensive Defense
@graph.description: When the opponent grazes or misses against the redirect, you can move one basic movement forward without additional AP cost.

@graph.name: Overwhelming Terror
@graph.description: Forces all frightened enemies to make a will test against the Stress and flee from the caster for 4 AP on a graze, 6 AP on a failure.

@graph.name: Pain
@graph.description: Causes a great sensation of pain, which paralyzes a target for 6 AP on a failure or 4 AP on a graze on a will test against the stress.

@graph.name: Performance Anxiety
@graph.description: Increases the DL of casting all spells by 5 against any enemy that is afraid.

@graph.name: Performance I/II/III
@graph.description: I. Allows the character to know a form of art, such as playing an instrument, magic tricks, jokes, etc. Gains +1/2/3 to tests to distract the audience.

@graph.name: Phantom Sound
@graph.description: The wizard makes a sound propagate from a point at a distance they do not need to see, only pointing in the general direction. The target must make a perception test to try to immediately know it is an illusion; otherwise, they will react normally to the sound. The sound can be as loud as a scream.

@graph.name: Phobia of x
@graph.description: Has a moral penalty when in the presence of the phobia's object. Gains 1 Ferocity XP if incapacitating the target of fear.

@graph.name: Pikeman
@graph.description: Increases the threat area of the reaction, allowing you to spend 1 STA to move 1 AP before using the braced attack as a reaction.

@graph.name: Possession
@graph.description: Attempts to enter and possess another body during the spiritual walk or as a ghost. This is only possible if the body is confused, unconscious, or if the target allows the possession. The target is Dominated for the duration. Each time the possessed makes a will test, the possessor must spend 1 STA to resist. Possession ends when the possessor's STA reaches 0 or the possessed succeeds on a will test.

@graph.name: Power Attack
@graph.description: Use muscle overcoming to make an attack stronger, increasing the STR attribute in the damage calculation, in the hook or supported attack test, or in the strength requirement of the attack. The strength bonus is equal to that of muscle overcoming.

@graph.name: Power Run
@graph.description: Increases running speed by 3m and long jump by +2m, but these actions cost 1 STA more.

@graph.name: Powerful Voice
@graph.description: Speaks very loudly.

@graph.name: Prayer
@graph.description: Improves the resting action. Focuses on the divine energy around, increasing STA regeneration by Devotion/2. Recovers 100\

@graph.name: Precise Reflexes
@graph.description: If the character uses reflexes without moving, reflexes only cost 1 AP.

@graph.name: Prepare
@graph.description: Setting up camp can be time-consuming without proper equipment, but it is essential to avoid exposure and to be able to cook food. The skill used is survival knowledge.

@graph.name: Prepared
@graph.description: The first time a prepared action is activated, it costs 1 AP less.

@graph.name: Preserve Corpse
@graph.description: Prevents decomposition from affecting a corpse or part of it for a full day.

@graph.name: Provocative Mockery
@graph.description: Forces enraged and confused targets to attack the caster for 6/4 AP on a failure and graze, respectively, on a will test against the stress.

@graph.name: Psychoactive Assistance
@graph.description: Focuses on a creature with whom they share a telepathic link. The caster can make a cunning or will test to resist or remove a mental status effect on behalf of anyone connected by a telepathic link.

@graph.name: Psychology I/II/III
@graph.description: I. Increases by +1/2/3 to your knowledge when trying to resist a social action. Allows for more elaborate opinions on the behavior of creatures in general.

@graph.name: Psychosis
@graph.description: Causes confusion in a target that fails or grazes on a will test against the Stress.

@graph.name: Quick Reload I/II
@graph.description: Reloads weapons 1/2 AP faster.

@graph.name: Quick Shooter I/II/III
@graph.description: I. Reduces the penalty for quick shots to -2/-1/0.

@graph.name: Radar
@graph.description: Can see through walls and thin barriers in a large radius for an instant. Can see invisible things. Can be improved multiple times by spending 1 STA for each and to increase the radius by 10km.

@graph.name: Rain
@graph.description: If there are enough clouds, converts them to a location and makes it rain there, soaking everything. Criticals can cause hail to fall, dealing 15 PEN of physical damage per turn.

@graph.name: Reattach Limb
@graph.description: Reattaches a limb to a body, adding a serious wound that requires 20 healing to function perfectly again.

@graph.name: Recharge Stone
@graph.description: Recharges charges of a stone. Atheist devotees can cast this spell without Hunger cost.

@graph.name: Regeneration
@graph.description: Actively manipulates the functions of a target's body to accelerate healing. Provides 1 healing for a wound for 10 minutes.

@graph.name: Regenerative Reservoir
@graph.description: The character has an internal reservoir that functions like a potion. The reservoir fills with rest while they are uninjured and can hold up to 6 heals.

@graph.name: Repair Metal
@graph.description: Repairs cracks in metals. Works like a cold weld, removing negative conditions from equipment.

@graph.name: Rescue
@graph.description: Compels an enchanted creature to protect its seducer for 8 AP on a failure in the will test against the Enchantment or for 6 AP on a graze.

@graph.name: Rest
@graph.description: is an action that costs 4 AP and recovers STA by an amount equal to STA/4.

@graph.name: Resurrection
@graph.description: The body performs rests after the character dies. If the character remains without deadly injuries during this time, they come back to life. Resurrection does not heal amputations.

@graph.name: Retaliation
@graph.description: Spend 1 AP to block with armor and move 1xMM. Gain an opportunity attack as long as you are not interrupted.

@graph.name: Retractable Claws
@graph.description: Gives an unarmed attack with a base damage of 6/1x and the properties of grappling and heavy I. Also improves climbing by +2 if not wearing gloves.

@graph.name: Revealing Light
@graph.description: A bluish light emanates, revealing all kinds of mysteries and invisible things. Transforms anything invisible within the area into something visible.

@graph.name: Revitalize
@graph.description: Performs a 5-minute ritual to revive a creature within reach of the body, as long as the body is in a condition to be alive and there is a sample of the soul nearby. The body is revived with all its wounds.

@graph.name: Riding
@graph.description: I. Learns to give commands to walk and run for mounts capable of understanding the command. II. The rider can utilize the mount's jumping, standing, swimming, and climbing movements if it is capable of understanding the commands. III. The rider can utilize the flight of their mount while riding.

@graph.name: Riposte
@graph.description: After redirecting a melee attack without being hit or critted, the character can make an opportunity attack as a reaction. The attack costs 1 AP less than the normal attack. The attack costs 2 AP less if made with an object different from the one used for defense.

@graph.name: Runner I/II
@graph.description: I. Increases running speed by +1m/2m. II. Increases jump height while running by +1m.

@graph.name: Search
@graph.description: Attempts to find desired type events and avoid unwanted types without getting lost. The test is made against all DL of events in the node simultaneously. Events are triggered in random or arbitrary order. Many events do not consume the exploration action, allowing the second event to be activated and so on.

@graph.name: Sensory Practice
@graph.description: Radar becomes a favorite spell and can be kept active constantly for 2 Exhaustion per hour.

@graph.name: Shield Marking
@graph.description: Maintains contact of the shield with the opponent's weapon, marking them and increasing the AP cost of their attacks against your shield by 1 after successfully blocking an attack (receiving a miss or graze). Only one opponent can be marked at a time. Blocking another opponent, receiving a hit or critical from the marked opponent, or leaving their threat area removes the marking.

@graph.name: Shield Wall
@graph.description: Gains +2 to block if holding a shield and adjacent to another character with a shield.

@graph.name: Shock Explosive
@graph.description: Loads explosives with alchemical energy to explode when activated, upon contact with fire or on impact, dealing 20xDM of impact damage and 20xDM PEN as an explosion.

@graph.name: Skilled Hands I/II/III
@graph.description: Gives +2/4/6 to prestidigitation. II. prestidigitation checks can be made safely.

@graph.name: Sleep
@graph.description: Causes someone who is not afraid or angry to fall asleep or to be asleep in combat. Targets fall asleep on a failure or a graze on a will test against the enchantment.

@graph.name: Smoke Explosive
@graph.description: Loads explosives with the effect of producing smoke when activated, upon contact with fire or on impact. The smoke renders anyone within the fog invisible to the naked eye and obscures visibility to a radius of 1m.

@graph.name: Spiritual Strike
@graph.description: Launches part of your soul violently at an enemy, interrupting them if the caster's animancy + 3 SM is greater than the target's will + 3 SM. If it is a critical hit, gain +3 animancy. The projectile is invisible to anyone who cannot detect spells.

@graph.name: Spiritual Walk
@graph.description: Exits the body in spirit form, leaving it unconscious. This form travels in any direction with a movement speed of 6m. It is invisible and immune to any type of damage and can cast spells normally, but the character spends 2 STA per turn while out of the body, or 1 STA per turn if perfected. The spirit's line of sight is equal to the basic version of the Synesthesia ability.

@graph.name: Sprinter I/II
@graph.description: I. Increases running speed by 1/2m.

@graph.name: Start Fire
@graph.description: Sets fire to any combustible material it can touch.

@graph.name: Steady Arms
@graph.description: Can move the equivalent of 1 AP of simple movement while shooting, without additional AP cost. It is considered that the shot came from the shooter's final position. Opportunity attacks are triggered at all positions along the path.

@graph.name: Stealthy I/II/III
@graph.description: +2/4/6 Stealth.

@graph.name: Stimulate Secretion
@graph.description: Forces a dead venomous animal to secrete venom and applies it to a weapon with slashing damage. The venom produced is sufficient for 1 application and the effect depends on the corpse used.

@graph.name: Stockholm Syndrome Attack
@graph.description: When the bard hits someone with a melee attack, they can forgo the damage to try to charm the opponent with +2 on a hit and +6 on a critical.

@graph.name: Storm of Lightning
@graph.description: As long as there are enough clouds, calls 2 lightning bolts per round in a designated area to hit random targets as a terrain effect. The lightning causes 25xDM electric damage and is defended by reflexes against DL 7.

@graph.name: Strafe
@graph.description: I. Shoots a short bow 3x within a single fighting surge, but takes -3 penalty to accuracy.

@graph.name: Strategist
@graph.description: Increases the amount of AP from the utility burst by +1/+2.

@graph.name: Strong Build
@graph.description: Increases RES by 1, decreases armor penalties and maximum AP by 1. However, standing up costs 3 AP, and running and jumping have speed reduced by 1m.

@graph.name: Strong Wind
@graph.description: Produces an entropic field that facilitates the movement of wind in one direction, causing a strong gust. Any projectiles going against the wind or perpendicular to it receive -2 to accuracy. Dispels fog and dust.

@graph.name: Stubborn
@graph.description: +1 to training talent when training alone and -1 when paying a trainer.

@graph.name: Subconscious INT I/II/III
@graph.description: Casting hidden spells increases the difficulty of the sensing test by +2/4/6.

@graph.name: Subjugate I/II
@graph.description: Increases the bonus of precise attacks to hit vulnerable attacks by +1/2.

@graph.name: Suggestion
@graph.description: Tells a creature that can hear and understand the words and is confused, enraged, enchanted, or frightened to do something, causing the compulsion to obey. If they fail or graze on a will test against Enchantment, they will obey. This compulsion should not cost more than 6 AP on a failure, 4 AP on a graze.

@graph.name: Superior Attention I/II/III
@graph.description: I. Increases detection by +2/4/6.

@graph.name: Supreme Intuition I/II
@graph.description: +1/2 to cunning and exploration.

@graph.name: Sustained Lightning
@graph.description: The caster attempts to create a sustained electric arc between themselves and a target, causing the base damage of the electrite x2DM electric damage. Once the spell hits, it only ends if the target leaves the spell's range or touches the caster, in which case the arc short-circuits, causing damage to both and ending the spell.

@graph.name: Swarm of Insects
@graph.description: Stimulates insect pheromone receptors in an area, causing nearby insects to swarm anyone present and sting them. The effects depend on the insects that are present.

@graph.name: Swimmer I/II/III
@graph.description: I. Can perform safe swimming tests and swim quickly. II. Spends 1 STA for 4 AP of fast swimming or 10 AP on criticals. III. Increases normal swimming speed to 0.5m xMM and fast swimming to 1m xMM.

@graph.name: Synesthesia I/II/III
@graph.description: I. Maintains an energy perimeter that amplifies perception. This character can see invisible things as if they were visible within a sphere around them. The volume of perception is filled as if it were gas. Solid impermeable objects block the radius of synesthesia. II. Can maintain synesthesia without spending STA per turn and allows extending the range of enhanced senses up to 2x Sensing by spending 1 STA per turn. III. Doubles the normal and increased radius.

@graph.name: Tactical Movement
@graph.description: Whenever the character's last action was running, they receive a +3 bonus to SD against subsequent ranged attacks.

@graph.name: Tactical Positioning
@graph.description: Can spend up to 3 AP on movement, cunning, or prestidigitation actions at the start of combat, before any character takes their turn. This ability does not work if the character is surprised.

@graph.name: Tail I/II
@graph.description: +1/2 for balance and climbing. II. Can hold things and hang with the tail.

@graph.name: Taser
@graph.description: Charges an object of electrite with electricity that discharges on the first object it comes into contact with, adding the electric damage of the material to the attack.

@graph.name: Technical Lift
@graph.description: The character can spend 1 STA to perform an evasive jump and stand up in the same action. The penalty for being down still applies during this movement.

@graph.name: Telepathic Link
@graph.description: Creates a telepathic link with a nearby creature if they fail or graze on a will test or if they allow the link. The caster can speak directly to the mind of their target during the duration of the spell or until the maximum distance is exceeded, at which point the spell breaks. Each simultaneous link increases the difficulty of the spellcasting test by 2.

@graph.name: Telepathic Suggestion
@graph.description: Makes suggestion a favorite spell and allows making suggestions telepathically to any detectable target, without the need to speak or establish a telepathic link.

@graph.name: Thrower I/II
@graph.description: The range of thrown weapons is increased by 50/100\

@graph.name: Tireless
@graph.description: Can rest in only 1 exploration turn.

@graph.name: Torment
@graph.description: Infects an unconscious target within range with a terrible and extremely realistic dream, which keeps the victim asleep until they can escape the dream by achieving a success or critical on a will test against the Stress. They can attempt to wake up every hour. The victim does not heal from this sleep and receives 2 exhaustion for each hour they remain asleep.

@graph.name: Toxic Gas
@graph.description: Causes a corpse to release poisonous gas for the entire duration. Undead count as corpses. Anyone breathing within the area at the start of their turn makes a Health test against the spell's DC to avoid coughing. Loses 6/4/2/0 AP, depending on the test result.

@graph.name: Toxic Sweat
@graph.description: Gains +3 to resist exposure to insects while intoxicated. Receives +3 on any defense against swarm-type opponents, unless they have resistance to alcohol.

@graph.name: Tracking
@graph.description: Learn to track.

@graph.name: Travel
@graph.description: Tries to move in the correct direction along the easiest path, avoiding accidents and dangers. The test is made against the DL of the path being attempted. A graze or mistake means that the search action is performed instead of traveling, triggering events within the node. A critical success or success means that no one got lost and the movement is as fast as possible. The test value used for traveling is also used against any events that are part of the path.

@graph.name: Traveler I/II/III
@graph.description: Increases Exploration by +2/4/6.

@graph.name: Tree House
@graph.description: Takes a tree and shapes it to have enough hollow space inside to serve as a room. The effect of the spell is permanent, but it takes the duration of the spell to shape the tree. The internal space is equal to 6 cubic meters, but can be increased by strengthening the spell.

@graph.name: Ugly
@graph.description: Gains -2 on seduction checks and +2 on intimidation in social actions.

@graph.name: Universal Communication
@graph.description: Allows asking yes or no questions to any creature with 3 INT or more. The questions must be simple enough for the creature to understand.

@graph.name: Vascular Control
@graph.description: Can spend all AP during choking without losing STA, unless left with negative AP.

@graph.name: Venom Glands
@graph.description: Allows for performing abilities with poison.

@graph.name: Visual Acuity
@graph.description: I. Reduces the distance penalty for cunning by half.

@graph.name: Visual Interference
@graph.description: Causes blindness in a target that fails or grazes on a will test.

@graph.name: Walk on Water
@graph.description: Can increase the surface tension of the water beneath your feet to walk on it.

@graph.name: Weapon Specialization I/II/III
@graph.description: Choose to receive +1/2/3 to hit, block, evade, and grapple while using a specific type of weapon. You can learn this ability for each weapon.
